alert.note: Alert for Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 04 at 3:22AM MST until January 06 at 12:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM WEDNESDAY TO NOON MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches above 9500 feet with locally higher amounts possible. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph above timberline. * WHERE...Gore and Elk Mountains/Central Mountain Valleys. * WHEN...From 6 AM Wednesday to noon MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause tree damage. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains
